Module jBomberman
Package view

Class EnjoyPowerUpMediator

java.lang.Object
model.PowerUpMediator
view.EnjoyPowerUpMediator
All Implemented Interfaces:
FootageFuncs, MyJBombermanFormat
public class EnjoyPowerUpMediator extends PowerUpMediator implements FootageFuncs, MyJBombermanFormat
Implemented version of PowerUpMediator from Model in which view components are developed. The Singleton Pattern simplifies the realization of dependencies towards this mediator.

    • renderPowerUps

      public Graphics2D renderPowerUps(Graphics2D g2)
      This method allows you to draw all the powerups on the game grid. There is no risk of overlap as a Tessera can hosts only one Prop. It is important to use a support array for these operations as you want to avoid a Concurrent Exception. This method is used by the DynaSlaveGame.
      Parameters:
      g2 - graphic context
      Returns:
      updated drawn graphic context
